full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 749 Filed 08/10/22 Page 163 of 236 LC3KMAX6 Parkinson - Direct (Government's Exhibits 269, 271, 272, 273, 276, and 277 received in evidence) MS. COMEY: Your Honor, may we please publish? THE COURT: You may. MS. COMEY: Ms. Drescher, let's please pull up Government Exhibit 269. Q. What do we see here? A. This is looking through the double doors. It is a small room, hallway, on the second floor. You are standing to the east, looking to the west. MS. COMEY: Let's go now, please, to 271. Q. What do we see here? A. This is the master bedroom. This is the master bed. And you are standing to the south, looking to the north. MS. COMEY: Let's go to 272, please. Q. What do we see here? A. This is the master bed. You're standing to the southeast, looking towards the northwest. MS. COMEY: Let's go to 273, please. Q. What do we see here? A. This is the second floor master bedroom, and if I'm not mistaken, you're looking to the -- I'm lost on my direction on that. Q. But is this in the master bedroom? A. It is. SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00018264

COMEY: Ms. Drescher, let's please pull up Government Exhibit 269. Q. What do we see here? A. This is looking through the double doors. It is a small room, hallway, on the second floor. You're standing to the southeast, looking towards the northwest. MS. COMEY: Let's go to 273, please. Q. What do we see here? A. This is the second floor master bedroom, and if I'm not mistaken, you're looking to the -- I'm lost on my direction on that. Q. But is this in the master bedroom? A. It is.
